content:
path /v3/solana/broadcast/confirm
operationid solanabroadcastconfirm
summary broadcast and confirm signed solana transaction
description 10 credits per api call
broadcast signed custom transactions to solana blockchain and waits for transaction confirmation depending on the commitment given more information about commitment levels here
requestbody
solanabroadcastconfirm
properties
txdata
description raw signed transaction to be published to network
maxlength 500000
minlength 1
type string
solanabroadcastconfirmoptions
description options for sending and waiting for a transaction
type object
properties
commitment
type string
description commitment to waiting for transaction confirmation
preflightcommitment
type string
description preflight commitment
required
txdata
type object
required true
responses
200
solanatransactionhashwithconfirm
type object
properties
txid
description tx hash of successful transaction
type string
confirmed
description indicates whether or not the transferred commitment has been fulfilled
type boolean
required
txid
confirmed
description ok
tag_summary:
solana is a blockchain network focused on fast transactions and high throughput it uses a unique method of ordering transactions to improve its speed users can pay their transaction fees and interact with smart contracts with sol the networks native cryptocurrency
for now solana is in beta and there is a rate limitation applied for all projects for solana to 40 req/s on the platform
tatum supports 2 chains
mainnet beta  a regular live chain
devnet  a chain used for testing purposes coins on the test chain have no value and can be obtained from
a faucet eg https//solfaucetcom/
title: 40_Solana_SolanaBroadcastConfirm_372.json
